TCCEncoding.cc

Summary
TCCEncoding.cc
Functions
enc__MIME__Base64 Encode message to MIME Base64 format (RFC 2045)
dec__MIME__Base64 Decode message from MIME Base64 format (RFC 2045)
enc__LDIF__Base64 Encode message to LDIF Base64 format (RFC 2849)
dec__LDIF__Base64 Decode message from LDIF Base64 format (RFC 2849)
f__enc__TBCD Encode charstring to TBCD
f__dec__TBCD Decode octetstring from TBCD encoding

Functions

enc__MIME__Base64

Purpose

Encode message to MIME Base64 format (RFC 2045)

Parameters

Return Value

charstring encoded message

-

Return Value
